about.subtitle: Full Stack developer with a feeling for depth.
about.aboutMeText: In 2021 I moved to Italy and I am still loving it. I live with my wife, two cast and dog in a small vilage in the north of Tuscany. What's so good about living here? There's good food, excelent coffee and stable WiFi. When I don't work I love to play tennis, read a Marvel strip or work in the garden.
